title: Bombay Meets Cincinnati: Nik Sharma Adapts the Rich Flavors of India
itunes:title: Bombay Meets Cincinnati: Nik Sharma Adapts the Rich Flavors of India
itunes:subtitle: Nik Sharma, author of “Season,” gives Milk Street a lesson in cooking with spices. Plus, we investigate the unknown culinary history of France; we make a magic pudding cake; give tips for whipping egg whites; and Adam Gopnik asks whether DNA diets are ...
description:
Nik Sharma, author of “Season,” gives Milk Street a lesson in cooking with spices. Plus, we investigate the unknown culinary history of France; we make a magic pudding cake; give tips for whipping egg whites; and Adam Gopnik asks whether DNA diets are fact or fiction.

For this week’s recipe, Maple-Whiskey Pudding Cakes, visit:


https://www.177milkstreet.com/recipes/maple-whiskey-pudding-cakes


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
